ygData.subject: Re: Lifetap anything for SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I m level 24 now. Whn I first got Vampiric it was hitting for 12. It now hits for 13, so I am guess 1 extra point every 2 levels. Nothing all that major
ygData.messageBody:
I'm level 24 now. Whn I first got Vampiric it was hitting for 12. It now hits
for 13, so I am guess 1 extra point every 2 levels. Nothing all that major
compared to what I do with weapons but it is an extra attack and we do get a
little health out of it. This isn't too bad but certainly get better.

Personally I'd like to see out harm touch be unresistable, or at least less
susesceptable. That is the primary concer for me. My group and I consistanly hit
on mobs that are Red to be, ie around lvl 28 t o30, and my spells can't touch
them, fair enough, but my HT should

Inos
Veeshan


Bradley Shelton wrote:

> From: Bradley Shelton <bradley_shelton@...>
>
> Yes, I have to agree with Lief on that too. I would be fantastic to have,
> but I doubt it will ever be implemented.
>
> What I think might be more feasible would be for Verant to increase the
> power of Vampiric Embrace so that it works exactly the same for both Necros
> and Shadow Knights. As near as I can tell, when we get it at level 22, it's
> effectiveness is already weaker then a Necromancer of around level 8. I've
> heard of many Necro's stating that it taps for 30+ a whack for them in the
> late teens, increasing by a point or so around every level. However, it
> seems that when we get the spell it is much weaker then a level 8 Necro's VE
> - which is why it taps for just six points or so at the start for us (which
> is in reality pretty useless). My Necro friend just confirmed that when
> Necro's get this spell around level 8, they tap for around 20 a whack. Why
> is it that when we get it, it starts at six?
>
> Now I'm only a paltry level 13, so I can't confirm the Vampiric Embrace
> performance for Shadow Knights myself. But, from what I have been able to
> gather from message boards, this spell is definitely performing differently
> for us.
>
> My only other suggestion would be for Voice Graft to be replaced with Hungry
> Earth, a Necromancer spell of comparison level that would fit into our DOT
> theme as well providing a much needed Root type of spell.
>
> Just my two cents.
>
> Zulk, Veeshan Troll SDK, 13th power
